title: Bought a skin with RP but it isn't unlocked.
body:
Yesterday i **bought RP points** and then i bought a twitch** skin.**
When i tried to use the skin it was still locked although my rp points have disappeared plus that on my purchase history is see that i have bought that skin.
I also tried to refund my purchase but i got an error that says to contact support.
Then i go to my collection and the unlock button at the skins is grey (not available).
if it was ip points i wouldnt care much. but its real money and i dont like games to have that kind for issues on this kind of trancactions.
i will need some advise if anyone has the same problem.

replies.body: The refund isn't working because that Twitch skin never actually made it onto your account for some weird reason. Since I'm seeing so many of these EU store issues, I'm asking that you all start shooting [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) our way so that we can track and get this fixed as quick as possible!
